description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
   Enhancements   
   DIAGRAMNET-50940-Improve setting the UIVisibility of Visio Page
   DIAGRAMNET-51188-Detecting format of vsdm, vssm and vstm files
   DIAGRAMNET-51214-Header/footer settings cannot be read for vsdx file
   DIAGRAMNET-51217-Cannot modify VBA Project in the VDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51218-Cannot retrieve Unique ID of a VSDX drawing
   DIAGRAMNET-51224-Retrieves an incorrect type value of the Shape data for VSDM
     
    Bugs  
   DIAGRAMNET-51056-The connector lines are not connected while creating a VDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51165-The connectors in the VDX are not connecting shapes properly
   DIAGRAMNET-51166-ObjectDisposedException is thrown when saving a diagram multiple times
   DIAGRAMNET-51167-Shapes are missing in output vsdxX     
   DIAGRAMNET-51168-Font is not set for a shape
   DIAGRAMNET-51169-Cannot retrieve from and to part of the connect of VDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51170-Visio can't open vsdx file when gif image is added. 
   DIAGRAMNET-51173-Does not preserve compound type of the connector shape in VSDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51177-The arrow button is not being displayed correctly on converting a VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51178-A duplicated text line is over-written while converting a VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51180-Incorrect layout of connectors on saving in the VSDX format
   DIAGRAMNET-51181-Incorrect layout of connectors on saving in the PDF format
   DIAGRAMNET-51182-Missing shapes on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51183-Displaced shapes on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51187-Vdx file is corrupted after saving
   DIAGRAMNET-51191-Responsibility box at bottom of shape is partially shaded on saving a VDX to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51192-The text phrases are not being spaced correctly on saving a VDX to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51193-An additional text appeared on saving a VDX to SVG 
   DIAGRAMNET-51200-The text items are overlapping on saving a VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51202-ArgumentOutOfRangeException on diagram saving   
   DIAGRAMNET-51203-Images are missing in saved vsdx
   DIAGRAMNET-51205-Displaced text and a missing character on converting a VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51206-Incorrect display at the bottom on converting a VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51207-Vdx file is corrupted after saving.
   DIAGRAMNET-51209-An error occurred on saving a drawing in PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51210-An error occurred on saving a drawing in PNG   
   DIAGRAMNET-51213-Cannot retrieve the accurate date and time value when the drawing was last saved
   DIAGRAMNET-51215-A rectangle shape is being rendered on converting a VSD to JPG
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
